name: S.U.B. Demo
description:
S.U.B. was created during the 2017 Global Game Jam by Spreadable Fruit, a Dutch Indie game studio of 6 members total. We continued to polish the game into a finished demo and S.U.B. is still in progress as we speak. We plan to release the full version of the game later on in 2017, around the third quarter.

S.U.B.(Secret Underwater Base) is a Cooperative Secret Agent Underwater Adventure game. Team up with a friend to infiltrate the evil doctor's secret underwater base. The fate of the world is in your hands.

  • Experience the main campaign to halt the evil plans.
  • Gain access to the base by using your state of the art submarine.
  • Hop into any role you want on the fly.
  • Upgrade and expand your submarine with new gadgets
  • Always be wary of the evil doctor's minions.
  • Explore your way through a fun mix of hand-crafted and procedurally generated levels.


To find more information about the development of S.U.B. and (the members of) Spreadable Fruit, please visit our Wordpress page or follow @FruitSpreadable on twitter
